text: wadhkr - 'ayuha alrasul - nabiin allah dawud wabnh slyman, 'iidh yahkuman fi qadiat eradaha khsman, eadat ghanam 'ahaduhuma ealaa zare alakhr, wantshrt fih laylana fatlft alzre, fhkm dawud bi'an takun alghnm lisahib alzare mlkana bima atlfth, fqymthma swa', wknna lihukmihim shahidin lm yaghib ena
